original_text: The ground received your brother's blood when you killed him. As a result, the ground no longer accepts you. It has brought a curse on you.
korean_text: 땅이 그 입을 벌려 네 손에서부터 네 아우의 피를 받았은즉 네가 땅에서 저주를 받으리니

sentences.original_text: The ground received your brother's blood
the ground no longer accepts you
sentences.korean_translation: 땅은 더 이상 너를 받아들이지 않는다

sentences.original_text: It has brought a curse on you
